about_the_game:
This aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 2 includes 100 new aircraft models and 20 additional sceneries.

The primary focus of this Expansion Pack 2 is realistic looking scale models and includes many famous aircraft.
This is the right addition to your aerofly RC 10 if you want to enjoy flying stunning looking scale fighters, jets, helicopters, gliders and professional multicopters on model airfields with lots of room or with fantastic slope soaring landscapes.

Choose from 20 popular sceneries like real world airports (e.g. the German airports Winzeln, Hahnweide, Wasserkuppe), popular RC flying event locations (Triple Tree, Tucson,...) and scenic slope soaring places.

INCLUDED AIRCRAFT


Aerobatic:
  • Christen Eagle
  • Crack Fokker
  • Nemesis NXT
  • Sbach 342
  • Yak-54
  • Yak-SP55M


Gliders:
  • ASK 13
  • Amigo4

  • Bird of Time
  • DFS-Reiher III
  • Duo Discus XLT
  • Foka 4
  • Nimbus 4
  • Nimbus 4 FES
  • Nimbus 4M
  • SB-13
  • SHK
  • Slope Infusion
  • Spalinger15
  • Speedwing


Jets:

INCLUDED SCENERIES


Included multi-panorama sceneries:
  • Hahnweide (Baden-Württemberg, Germany)
  • Schalmi (Adelboden, Switzerland)
  • Triple Tree (South Carolina, USA)
  • USS Hornet (California, USA)
  • Winzeln-Schramberg (Baden-W., Germany)


Included panorama sceneries:
  • Arvada East Field (Colorado, USA)
  • Eschenlohe (Bavaria, Germany)
  • Flagstaff Flyers (Arizona, USA)
  • Grassau (Bavaria, Germany)
  • Half Moon Bay (California, USA)
  • Hawk Field (Nebraska, USA)
  • Hodges Hobbies (Georgia, USA)
  • Lee Vining Airport (California, USA)
  • Lincoln Sky Knights (Nebraska, USA)
  • Mono Lake (California, USA)
  • Rottenburg MSV (Baden-W., Germany)
  • Sevenmile Canyon (Utah, USA)
  • Tucson Modelplex (Arizona, USA)
  • Twin City Eagles (Iowa, USA)
  • Wasserkuppe (Hesse, Germany)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 2 includes 100 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.
